name: Bourbon Barrel Aged Cousin Jax
description: Way up in the Keewenaw Peninsula in Michigans UP, Mt. Bohemia ski area has a powder run hidden at the top called "Cousin Jack" (named after the Cornish miners)that winds its' way steeply through the rocks and trees. AAAHHH WINTER!!! Double the Belgian Malt, double the Amarillo hops-a perfect way to end any day. Everyones' favorite cousin!
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale
